snippet.title: Never Give Up - Coming to Nintendo Switch on August 13, 2019!
snippet.description:
Never Give Up is a death-defying platformer packed full of vicious traps and hazards specifically designed to turn you into bloody chunks, and where the only way out— is through. It may break your controller, don't let it break your will.

Get it on Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/never-give-up-switch/
Also available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/609420/Never_Give_Up/
